content.title: What's New in 1804
content.body: Improved Search Algorithm and UI. We hear you! Now you are able to search for something quickly in the dashboard. Feature is included in this version for free.

content.title: AI capability
content.body: Our AI will now inform you which products underperform! Just kidding.

content.title: Chatbot
content.body: If you heard of Siri, you will understand this. Ask our chatbot any questions like 'Will you buy this product?' and get a smart response.
